CheckTitle: Minimum TLS version is set to 1.2 or higher
Description: Verifies that the minimum TLS version is configured to at least TLS 1.2 to ensure connections use secure, modern cryptographic protocols.
Risk: Allowing legacy TLS versions (1.0, 1.1) exposes connections to known protocol vulnerabilities including BEAST, POODLE, and weak cipher suites that can be exploited for traffic decryption.

Recommendation.Text: Set minimum TLS version to 1.2 or higher. TLS 1.0 and 1.1 are deprecated by all major browsers and contain known vulnerabilities that compromise connection security.
